mapper.delete: delete from postsLike where memberId = #{memberId} and postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from postsLike where memberId = #{memberId} and postNo = #{postNo}

SELECT no, bandNo, writerId, hashtag, content, wroteAt, viewCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM postsLike pl WHERE pl.postNo = p.no) AS likeCnt, commentCnt FROM posts p WHERE bandNo = #{bandNo} ORDER BY wroteAt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{amount}
